database

类 Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Data

  • public class Data
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Data() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void add(Account a, Customer c)
      use to add a new account into the customer and save into database
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> get()
      find all customer in database
      static void updateAccount(java.lang.String accName, java.lang.String index, java.lang.String newValue)
      use to save the balance of account

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Data

        public Data()

    • 方法详细资料

      • updateAccount

        public static void updateAccount(java.lang.String accName,
                                 java.lang.String index,
                                 java.lang.String newValue)
        use to save the balance of account
        参数:
        accName - the name of account as primary key
        index - the index of column
        newValue - the new value of account

      • add

        public static void add(Account a,
                       Customer c)
        use to add a new account into the customer and save into database
        参数:
        a - new account
        c - the customer

      • get

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> get()
        find all customer in database
        返回:
        the list of customer
